summary: This is a calendar entry for a planning/coordination meeting between SDNY (Southern District of New York) and an individual named Epstein, scheduled for July 1, 2019. The entry was created on June 28, 2019, and later modified on August 1, 2019.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The individual with whom SDNY is scheduled to have a planning/coordination meeting.

events.title: SDNY-Epstein Planning Meeting
events.description: A planning/coordination meeting scheduled between the Southern District of New York (SDNY) and Epstein.

keyFacts: A meeting was scheduled for July 1, 2019, between SDNY prosecutors and Epstein.
The meeting was categorized as 'X-PERSONAL' and given a high priority (5).
The calendar entry was created on June 28, 2019, and later modified on August 1, 2019, after Epstein's arrest.
